item.title: Kubernetes Multi-environment and Multi-application Orchestration Practice
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: By implementing a Kubernetes multi-environment and multi-application orchestration with the same configuration by YAML(Manifests), Kustomize and Helm, we can quickly get started with Kustomize and Helm and understand the differences between them.

item.title: Kubernetes Container Healthcheck and Graceful Termination
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Implementing container health checks and graceful termination in Kubernetes with application-specific configurations enhances production stability, reduces deployment incidents and false alarms.

item.title: Lightweight Kubernetes Distributions Practices
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Deploying and managing native Kubernetes clusters is a complex task. To address this issue, the community has provided lightweight Kubernetes distributions as a solution.

item.title: Setup Kubernetes Cluster Using kubeadm
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: kubeadm performs the actions necessary to get a minimum viable cluster up and running.
